query.esql:
from logs-corelight.various*
| where rdp.cookie is not null and observer.hostname IS NOT NULL and rdp.inferences is not null
| limit 10000
| STATS COUNT() by @timestamp, rdp.cookie , observer.hostname , source.ip, destination.ip, destination.port , event.outcome  , rdp.inferences 
| eval Name = case(rdp.inferences == "APWA","Automated Password Authentication Automated NTLM Password Authentication")
| rename @timestamp as _time, rdp.cookie as connecting_user, observer.hostname as system_name, source.ip as origin.ip, destination.ip as id.resp_h, destination.port as id.resp_p, event.outcome as auth_success, rdp.inferences as inferences
| keep _time, connecting_user, system_name, origin.ip, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, auth_success, inferences, Name
